# GET /v1/appEvents/{id}/localizations | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appEvents/{id}/localizations ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_-localizations)

-  GET /v1/appEvents/{id}/localizations 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appEvents/{id}/localizations

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_-localizations#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appEvents/{id}/localizations
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_-localizations#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_-localizations#query-parameters)

`fields[appEventLocalizations]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `locale, name, shortDescription, longDescription, appEvent, appEventScreenshots, appEventVideoClips``fields[appEventScreenshots]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `fileSize, fileName, imageAsset, assetToken, uploadOperations, assetDeliveryState, appEventAssetType, appEventLocalization``fields[appEventVideoClips]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `fileSize, fileName, previewFrameTimeCode, videoUrl, previewFrameImage, previewImage, uploadOperations, assetDeliveryState, videoDeliveryState, appEventAssetType, appEventLocalization``include``[string]`

 Possible Values: `appEvent, appEventScreenshots, appEventVideoClips``limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200``limit[appEventScreenshots]``integer`

 Maximum: `50``limit[appEventVideoClips]``integer`

 Maximum: `50``fields[appEvents]``[string]`

 Possible Values: `referenceName, badge, eventState, deepLink, purchaseRequirement, primaryLocale, priority, purpose, territorySchedules, archivedTerritorySchedules, localizations`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_-localizations#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppEventLocalizationsResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventlocalizationsresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`` Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appEvents-_id_-localizations#see-also)
